name: CT_STATION
description: This table contains one row for each chart station in the chart station (CHL) master file.

columns.name: STATION_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID assigned to the chart station.

columns.name: STATION_ID_STATION_NAME
columns.description: This is the name of the chart station.

columns.name: STATION_NAME
columns.description: This is the name of the chart station.
